4
How could ontologies help? 
• How could ontologies help? 
• Providing the necessary “glue” among the different
resources by capturing knowledge and facilitating the
alignement of heterogeneous resources in multiple
languages
• BUT…
• How to deal with the cultural and subjective
discrepancies in the representation of agricultural
information?
speaker: SYSTEM
